text: Ulrich "Ueli" Maurer (born 1 December 1950)Eidgenössische Bundeskanzlei: Der Bund kurz erklärt, Seite 63. Erschienen 2009. is a Swiss politician. He was a member of the Swiss Federal Council from 2009 to 2022. In 2019, he was the President of the Swiss Confederation. He is a member of the Swiss People's Party. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Hinwil District Category:People from the canton of Zürich
title: Ueli Maurer
